    • Uses of Message in com.botticelli.bot

      Methods in com.botticelli.bot that return Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message Bot.forwardMessage(ForwardMessageToSend fts)
      Use this method to forward messages of any kind.
      Message Bot.sendAudiobyReference(AudioReferenceToSend ars)
      Use this method to send Audio by file_id, On success, the sent Message is returned.
      Message Bot.sendAudioFile(AudioFileToSend afs)
      Use this method to send audio files, if you want Telegram clients to display the file as a playable voice message.
      Message Bot.sendDocumentbyReference(DocumentReferenceToSend drs)
      Use this method to send files by file_id, On success, the sent Message is returned.
      Message Bot.sendDocumentFile(DocumentFileToSend dfs)
      Use this method to send general files.
      Message Bot.sendLocation(LocationToSend lts)
      Use this method to send point on the map.
      Message Bot.sendMessage(MessageToSend mts)
      Use this method to send text messages.
      Message Bot.sendPhotobyReference(PhotoReferenceToSend prs)
      Use this method to send Photos by file_id, On success, the sent Message is returned.
      Message Bot.sendPhotoFile(PhotoFileToSend pfs)
      Use this method to send photos by file.
      Message Bot.sendStickerbyReference(StickerReferenceToSend srs)
      Use this method to send Stickers by file_id, On success, the sent Message is returned.
      Message Bot.sendStickerFile(StickerFileToSend sfs)
      Use this method to send .webp stickers.
      Message Bot.sendVideobyReference(VideoReferenceToSend vrs)
      Use this method to send video files by file_id, On success, the sent Message is returned.
      Message Bot.sendVideoFile(VideoFileToSend vfs)
      Use this method to send video files, Telegram clients support mp4 videos (other formats may be sent as Document).
      Message Bot.sendVoicebyReference(VoiceReferenceToSend vrs) 
      Message Bot.sendVoiceFile(VoiceFileToSend vfs)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void Bot.audioMessage(Message m)
      This method will be called when bot received an audio file (not voice).
      abstract void Bot.contactMessage(Message m)
      This method will be called when bot received a contact

      This method will be called when bot received a File

      This method will be called when the group chat is created
      abstract void Bot.groupChatPhotoDeleteMessage(Message m)
      This method will be called when the photo chat is deleted
      abstract void Bot.leftChatParticipantMessage(Message m)
      This method will be called when a participant left the chat
      abstract void Bot.locationMessage(Message m)
      This method will be called when bot received a location
      void Bot.manageMessage(Message message)
      This method read the message values and pass the message on to the appropriate method.
      abstract void Bot.newChatParticipantMessage(Message m)
      This method will be called when a new participant join the Chat.
      abstract void Bot.newChatPhotoMessage(Message m)
      This method will be called when the photo chat is changed
      abstract void Bot.newChatTitleMessage(Message m)
      This method will be called when the chat title is changed
      abstract void Bot.photoMessage(Message m)
      This method will be called when bot received a photo
      abstract void Bot.stickerMessage(Message m)
      This method will be called when bot received a sticker.
      abstract void Bot.textMessage(Message m)
      This method will be called when bot received a text message.
      abstract void Bot.videoMessage(Message m)
      This method will be called when bot received a video.
      abstract void Bot.voiceMessage(Message m)
      This method will be called when bot received a voice message

      Methods in com.botticelli.bot.request that return Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message RequestMaker.forwardMessage(ForwardMessageToSend fts)
      Use this method to forward messages of any kind.
      Message RequestMaker.sendAudiobyReference(AudioReferenceToSend ars)
      Use this method to send Audio by file_id, On success, the sent Message is returned, else return null.
      Message RequestMaker.sendAudioFile(AudioFileToSend afs)
      Use this method to send audio files, if you want Telegram clients to display the file as a playable voice message.
      Message RequestMaker.sendDocumentbyReference(DocumentReferenceToSend drs)
      Use this method to send files by file_id, On success, the sent Message is returned, else return null.
      Message RequestMaker.sendDocumentFile(DocumentFileToSend dfs)
      Use this method to send general files.
      Message RequestMaker.sendLocation(LocationToSend lts)
      Use this method to send point on the map.
      Message RequestMaker.sendMessage(MessageToSend mts)
      Use this method to send text messages.
      Message RequestMaker.sendPhotobyReference(PhotoReferenceToSend prs)
      Use this method to send Photos by file_id, On success, the sent Message is returned, else return null.
      Message RequestMaker.sendPhotoFile(PhotoFileToSend pfs)
      Use this method to send photos by file.
      Message RequestMaker.sendStickerbyReference(StickerReferenceToSend srs)
      Use this method to send Stickers by file_id, On success, the sent Message is returned, else return null.
      Message RequestMaker.sendStickerFile(StickerFileToSend sfs)
      Use this method to send .webp stickers.
      Message RequestMaker.sendVideobyReference(VideoReferenceToSend vrs)
      Use this method to send video files by file_id, On success, the sent Message is returned, else return null.
      Message RequestMaker.sendVideoFile(VideoFileToSend vfs)
      Use this method to send video files, Telegram clients support mp4 videos (other formats may be sent as Document).
